text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump @GovMurphy #coronavirus #TrumpLiedAmericansDied 
What did your administration do in Jan, Feb and March to prepare and prevent? Did @realDonaldTrump improve your golf game?

Please explain that to us and our families.

Signed virtually, 

62,444 #Dead #Americans
